Dragon Quest Monsters - Caravan Heart (J.original_desc: Up to his usual mischief, Kiefer upsets his father, the King of Gran Estard, more than ever before and flees to his room in hopes of escaping his punishment. Hiding inside his dresser, Kiefer hears a voice call out to him and wanders out to an odd silence and the presence of a Travelers' Gate in his room. Once stepping in, Kiefer finds himself in the world of Dragon Quest II and must no sooner assume the role of a caravan leader in order to help a boy named Luin find a cure for his sick parents.
Dragon Quest Monsters - Caravan Heart (J.desc: 基弗一如既往的惡作劇讓他的父親，大埃斯塔德國王比以往任何時候都更加不安，並逃到他的房間，希望逃脫他的懲罰。基弗躲在梳妝台裡，聽到有人呼喚他，於是他走出去，房間裡一片奇怪的寂靜，房間裡有一扇旅行者之門。一旦踏入，基弗就發現自己身處《勇者鬥惡龍 II》的世界中，他必須立即扮演商隊領袖的角色，以幫助一個名叫魯因的男孩為他生病的父母找到治療方法。

Pokemon - Ruby Version (USA, Europe) (Re.name: 寶可夢系列 (遊戲)
Pokemon - Ruby Version (USA, Europe) (Re.original_desc:
Immerse yourself in the beautiful region of Hoenn, a place of masterful heroes and mysterious teams, of friendship and battles. As the new kid in town, you set off on your journey as a Pokémon Trainer. Who knows what wonders and dangers await you? Now it's time to grab your gear and head out on your own...

-Over 200 Pokémon appear with over 100 new discovered species--you'll have to link up and trade with a friend who has Sapphire Version to catch them all!
-2-on-2 battles--use two of your Pokémon in a battle at the same time!
-Engage in intense multi battles with up to four friends!
-Pokémon Contests let you groom your Pokémon to be the Best of Show!
-Stunning Game Boy Advance graphics display the world of Pokémon with more detail than ever!
Pokemon - Ruby Version (USA, Europe) (Re.desc:
沉浸在美麗的豐緣地區，這裡充滿了高超的英雄和神秘的團隊，充滿了友誼和戰鬥。作為鎮上的新來的孩子，你踏上了神奇寶貝訓練師的旅程。誰知道有什麼奇蹟和危險在等待著你呢？現在是時候拿起你的裝備，獨自出發了……

- 超過 200 只神奇寶貝和超過 100 種新發現的物種出現——你必須與擁有藍寶石版的朋友聯繫並進行交易才能捕捉到所有它們！
-2對2戰鬥——同時使用兩隻神奇寶貝進行戰鬥！
- 與最多四位朋友進行激烈的多人戰鬥！
- 神奇寶貝大賽可讓您培養您的神奇寶貝，使其成為最佳表演者！
- 令人驚嘆的 Game Boy Advance 圖形以比以往更多的細節展示神奇寶貝世界！

Sabre Wulf (USA).name: Sabre Wulf
Sabre Wulf (USA).original_desc:
The amulet that had been in place to imprison Sabrewulf has been shattered by the evil Dr. Dolittle-Goode. Now, it is up to Sabreman to traverse the land in pursuit of these villains; and to retrieve the eight pieces of the amulet.

The game is separated into two modes of play: the 3D exploration mode and the 2D platforming sections. The 3D exploration mode is how Sabreman gets around the eight different themed worlds of Sabre Wulf. While there are no enemies in this mode, there are plenty of people to talk to, who might help you in your quest. Also strewn about are more than fifty 2D platforming levels, which you can access through the wulf's head tunnels.
Sabre Wulf (USA).desc:
用於囚禁 Sabrewulf 的護身符已被邪惡的 Dolittle-Goode 博士打碎。現在，薩布雷曼必須穿越這片土地追捕這些惡棍；並取回八塊護身符。

遊戲分為兩種遊戲模式：3D 探索模式和 2D 平台部分。3D 探索模式是 Sabreman 探索 Sabre Wulf 八個不同主題世界的方式。雖然此模式中沒有敵人，但有很多人可以交談，他們可能會幫助你完成任務。還散佈著五十多個 2D 平台關卡，您可以通過狼人的頭部隧道進入這些關卡。

Rhythm Heaven Silver (Japan) (Translated.name: 节奏天国
Rhythm Heaven Silver (Japan) (Translated.original_desc:
Rhythm Tengoku is a music game based around good timing and rhythm. The game has music supplied by the record production company J.P. ROOM, and is developed by the team responsible for Wario Ware.

As with Wario Ware, the game is actually a series of shorter games bundled into one package. Before each game starts, you are presented with a short tutorial that gets you ready and practice before you begin the real thing.

Players will punch in time with a karate expert as pots and rocks are thrown; pluck hairs off of an onion; march in time to an instructor; hit a baseball while the screen zooms in and out; shoot ghosts with arrows; chop demons as a samurai; and much more. At the end of each set of stages is a 'remix stage' - in this stage, sections of the previously played stages are combined and thrown at you at random, all while a single song plays.
Rhythm Heaven Silver (Japan) (Translated.desc:
Rhythm Tengoku 是一款基於良好時機和節奏的音樂遊戲。遊戲的音樂由唱片製作公司 J.P. ROOM 提供，並由負責 Wario Ware 的團隊開發。

與《Wario Ware》一樣，該遊戲實際上是捆綁在一個包中的一系列較短的遊戲。在每個遊戲開始之前，您都會看到一個簡短的教程，幫助您在開始真正的遊戲之前做好準備和練習。

玩家將在投擲罐子和石塊時與空手道專家及時打拳；拔掉洋蔥上的毛；及時行進到教練身邊；當屏幕放大和縮小時擊打棒球；用箭射鬼；作為武士斬妖除魔；還有更多。每組階段的末尾是一個“混音階段”——在這個階段，之前播放的階段的部分被組合起來並隨機扔給你，同時播放一首歌曲。

Spyro - Attack of the Rhynocs (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Spyro - Attack of the Rhynocs (USA).original_desc: In a terrible mishap, Spyro, Sparx, and the Professor have inadvertently torn a hole in the fabric of space between the Rhynoc and Dragon Realms. Now, at the command of the elusive Ripto, droves of Rhynocs are pouring into the Dragon Realms in yet another attempt to make life miserable. As Spyro, Agent 9, or Sergeant Byrd, you must help the Professor close the hole quickly before the gate becomes too big and the two realms fuse together--permanently. You can use Spyro's new abilities, including the Head-Butt Slam, Cyclone Attack, Phoenix Vision, and more.
Spyro - Attack of the Rhynocs (USA).desc: 在一次可怕的事故中，斯派羅、斯帕克斯和教授無意中在犀牛王國和龍王國之間的空間結構上撕開了一個洞。現在，在難以捉摸的瑞普託的指揮下，成群的犀牛正湧入龍界，再次試圖讓生活變得悲慘。作為小龍斯派羅、9號特工或伯德中士，你必須幫助教授迅速關閉這個洞，以免大門變得太大，兩個領域永久地融合在一起。您可以使用小龍斯派羅的新能力，包括頭撞猛擊、旋風攻擊、鳳凰視覺等等。

Denki Blocks! (USA) (En,Es).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Denki Blocks! (USA) (En,Es).original_desc:
Denki Blocks! uses a single, simple digital toy set to provide a collection of 'puzzle games'.

Denki Blocks! is played by sliding blocks around a board. When blocks of the same colour touch, they stick together to form clumps. Sometimes the player has to join all blocks of the same colour in any way possible. Sometimes specific shapes have to be made.
Denki Blocks! (USA) (En,Es).desc:
電氣塊！使用單一、簡單的數字玩具套裝來提供一系列“益智遊戲”。

電氣塊！是通過在棋盤上滑動滑塊來玩的。當相同顏色的塊接觸時，它們會粘在一起形成團塊。有時，玩家必須以任何可能的方式連接所有相同顏色的塊。有時必須製作特定的形狀。

Mega Man Zero 3 (USA).name: 洛克人Zero (游戏)
Mega Man Zero 3 (USA).original_desc:
In the third installment of Capcom's Mega Man Zero series, you, unsurprisingly, play as Zero. Continuing where the Mega Man Zero 2 left off, you have to find and neutralize the recently escaped "Dark Elf," before it's able to brainwash the Resistance for the purpose of conquering Neo Arcadia. 

In addition to the old Cyber Elf system, this game also contains a new "chip" system, where Zero can gain new abilities by finding chips and installing chip in himself. But they didn't decide to abandon the Cyber Elves in this game by giving them nothing new. No, in order to extend the life of the Cyber Elves, they added the new concept of "Cyber Space" to levels, where you enter a door to Cyber Space and are allowed to use each Cyber Elf as much as you please without them dying. However, there aren't too many "Secret Disks" (items that can contain anything from profiles of characters to Cyber Elves to new chips) in Cyber Space, so it's better to spend more time in the normal level.
Mega Man Zero 3 (USA).desc:
在 Capcom 的《洛克人零》系列的第三部中，不出所料，你將扮演零。繼續《洛克人零式 2》的故事，你必須找到並消滅最近逃脫的“黑暗精靈”，然後它才能對抵抗組織進行洗腦，以征服新阿卡迪亞。

除了舊的網絡精靈系統外，這款遊戲還包含了新的“芯片”系統，零可以通過尋找芯片並在自己身上安裝芯片來獲得新的能力。但他們並沒有決定在這款遊戲中放棄網絡精靈，不給他們任何新東西。不，為了延長網絡精靈的壽命，他們在關卡中添加了“網絡空間”的新概念，你進入網絡空間的大門，可以隨意使用每個網絡精靈，而不會導致他們死亡。不過，賽博空間中的“秘密磁盤”（可以包含從角色簡介到網絡精靈到新芯片等任何內容的物品）並不多，所以最好在正常關卡上多花點時間。

Banjo-Kazooie - Grunty's Revenge (USA, E.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Banjo-Kazooie - Grunty's Revenge (USA, E.original_desc: Gruntilda is back, and it's up to Banjo and Kazooie to stop her master plan. In Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Revenge, you'll play as Banjo and follow him through six worlds rife with trials and contests. Some of the challenges you must overcome include solving puzzles, avoiding obstacles, and battling different enemies. Defeat your foes by using Banjo's array of combat moves. You can also seek help from witch doctors, who can transform Banjo into a mouse, a tank, and other creatures.
Banjo-Kazooie - Grunty's Revenge (USA, E.desc: 格倫蒂達回來了，班卓琴和卡祖伊必須阻止她的總體計劃。在《Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty's Revenge》中，您將扮演班卓琴並跟隨他穿越六個充滿考驗和競賽的世界。你必須克服的一些挑戰包括解決謎題、躲避障礙以及與不同的敵人作戰。使用班卓琴的一系列戰鬥動作擊敗你的敵人。您還可以向巫醫尋求幫助，他們可以將班卓琴變成老鼠、坦克和其他生物。

Super Mario Advance 4 - Super Mario Bros.key: Super Mario Advance 4 - Super Mario Bros. 3 (USA, Australia) (Rev 1)
Super Mario Advance 4 - Super Mario Bros.original_name: Super Mario Advance 4 : Super Mario Bros. 3
Super Mario Advance 4 - Super Mario Bros.name: 超级马力欧 奥德赛
Super Mario Advance 4 - Super Mario Bros.original_desc: A combination of exciting platforming action, wild power-ups, and charming Mario style has made Super Mario Bros. 3 a classic. With Super Mario Advance 4: Super Mario Bros. 3, you have your chance to partake in the special adventure anywhere you go on your Game Boy Advance. Your mission is to rescue the Mushroom Kingdom monarchs who have been transformed into animals by Bowser and his mischievous offspring, and in the process save the princess kidnapped by Bowser. Traverse eight huge worlds and encounter fun minigames and frantic boss battles as you explore the first Mario game to use an overworld map.
Super Mario Advance 4 - Super Mario Bros.desc: 激動人心的平台動作、狂野的強化道具和迷人的馬里奧風格相結合，使《超級馬里奧兄弟 3》成為經典。在《超級馬里奧高級 4：超級馬里奧兄弟 3》中，無論您身在何處，您都有機會在 Game Boy Advance 上參與特殊的冒險。你的任務是營救被庫巴和他頑皮的後代變成動物的蘑菇王國君主，並在此過程中拯救被庫巴綁架的公主。當您探索第一款使用世界地圖的馬里奧遊戲時，穿越八個巨大的世界，遇到有趣的小遊戲和瘋狂的頭目戰鬥。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (USA).name: 忍者龜：變種大亂鬥
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (USA).original_desc:
The heroes in a half shell are back in an all new adventure. The four turtles have been split up in order to combat the many bad guys that surround the city.

Each turtle (Leonardo, Michelangelo, Raphael & Donatello) has their own set of levels to complete, with their own distinct moves and combat options to use during battle. Along with a set of side-scrolling levels, complete with end of level boss battles, the four turtles will also get the chance to race through the sewers in the unique 3rd person race modes, shooting down the enemy or collecting items, while Donatello takes to the sky in the Shell Glider and Raphael challenges Casey Jones to a one-on-one cycle race.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (USA).desc:
半殼英雄們又回來了，開始了全新的冒險。四隻烏龜被分開，以對抗城市周圍的許多壞人。

每隻烏龜（萊昂納多、米開朗基羅、拉斐爾和多納泰羅）都有自己的一套關卡需要完成，並在戰鬥中使用自己獨特的動作和戰鬥選項。除了一系列橫向捲軸關卡以及關卡結尾的 Boss 戰外，四隻海龜還將有機會以獨特的第三人稱競賽模式穿過下水道，擊落敵人或收集物品，而多納泰羅則駕駛貝殼滑翔機飛向天空，拉斐爾則向凱西·瓊斯發起一對一的自行車賽挑戰。

Metroid Fusion (USA).name: 超级银河战士
Metroid Fusion (USA).original_desc: While lending mission support on planet SR388, interstellar bounty hunter Samus Aran is attacked by an X parasite, an organism with the ability to mimic the abilities of any creature it infects. Near death, Samus is saved by a vaccine made from the DNA of the last Metroid -- the X parasite's only natural predator. When the X spread to a research station in orbit around SR388, a weakened Samus is forced to exterminate them all ... or die trying.
Metroid Fusion (USA).desc: 星際賞金獵人薩姆斯·阿蘭在 SR388 星球上提供任務支持時，遭到 X 寄生蟲的攻擊，這是一種能夠模仿其感染的任何生物能力的生物體。瀕臨死亡的 Samus 被最後一個銀河戰士（X 寄生蟲唯一的天敵）DNA 製成的疫苗拯救了。當 X 擴散到 SR388 周圍軌道上的一個研究站時，虛弱的薩姆斯被迫將他們全部消滅……或者死去。

Super Robot Taisen - Original Generation.name: 任天堂DS游戏列表
Super Robot Taisen - Original Generation.original_desc: The battle rages on! Peace slowly settles over the planet Earth after a brutal war against the alien armada. However, the world is not able to rest for long, as new forces emerge and threaten to bring Earth to it's knees once again. Use all the cunning and tactical skill you have to command the best and brightest mech pilots the world has ever seen in saving humanity from enemies bent on dominating the human race - or worse, annihilating it's very existence.
Super Robot Taisen - Original Generation.desc: 戰鬥愈演愈烈！在與外星艦隊的殘酷戰爭之後，和平慢慢地降臨在地球上。然而，世界無法長久休息，因為新的力量出現並威脅著地球再次屈服。運用你所擁有的一切狡猾和戰術技能，指揮世界上最優秀、最聰明的機甲飛行員，從一心統治人類的敵人手中拯救人類——或者更糟糕的是，消滅人類的存在。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 - Battle.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 - Battle Nexus (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 - Battle.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 : Battle Nexus
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 - Battle.name: 2025年電子遊戲界
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 - Battle.original_desc:
Play with
Up To 4 Players!
Venture with the Turtles to shell and back in TMNT 2: BattleNexus . Pick up the action on a strange new planet with mysterious new technology. Two tail-kickin' modes deliver green-knuckled action including Story and Battle Nexus Mode!

-Specialized moves for each Turtle!
-4-player shell-action!
-Cooperative play & head-to-head four player competition
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2 - Battle.desc:
這是一個包含有一定影響力的電子遊戲開發商列表，這些公司製作了包括但不限於電腦（如PC或Mac）、遊戲主機、可攜式設備或行動裝置的電子遊戲。該列表包括目前存在和已經關閉的開發商。
關於開發商開發的遊戲更詳盡的內容，請參閱電子遊戲列表。想了解更多已停運的開發商內容，請參閱已結業電子遊戲公司。需要注意的是個人開發者獨立開發的遊戲，與之相關的遊戲開發者/開發商通常不會收錄在此列表中，相關內容請參考獨立遊戲開發商列表。

Metroid - Zero Mission (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Metroid - Zero Mission (USA).original_desc: She's battled baddies on nearly every Nintendo system, and now, Samus Aran returns to her roots. Metroid: Zero Mission relives the story that started it all--revealing for the first time full details of her meeting with the Metroids. The plotline will be familiar to longtime fans of the Metroid series, but the challenges are new, the power-ups are plentiful, and the graphics and sound are supercharged. Plus, if you thought that the original Metroid had a surprise ending, wait until you get past the Mother Brain in Metroid: Zero Mission. A new twist provides a deeper adventure than ever before.
Metroid - Zero Mission (USA).desc: 她幾乎在所有任天堂系統上都與壞人戰鬥過，而現在，薩姆斯·阿蘭又回到了她的根源。《銀河戰士：零任務》重溫了這一切開始的故事——首次揭示了她與銀河戰士會面的全部細節。《銀河戰士》系列的長期粉絲會熟悉該情節，但挑戰是新的，能力提升充足，圖形和聲音也非常強大。另外，如果你認為最初的《銀河戰士》有一個令人驚訝的結局，那就等到你通過《銀河戰士：零任務》中的母腦吧。新的轉折提供了比以往更深入的冒險。

Castlevania - Harmony of Dissonance (USA.name: 恶魔城系列
Castlevania - Harmony of Dissonance (USA.original_desc: Nearly fifty years has past since Simon Belmont rescued the land from the curse of Dracula. Now, Simon's descendant Juste Belmont, must acquire the relics of Dracula to unravel the disappearance of his childhood friend Lydie. The castle's enchanting mysteries and danger await all those who dare enter.
Castlevania - Harmony of Dissonance (USA.desc: 自從西蒙貝爾蒙特將這片土地從德古拉的詛咒中拯救出來以來，已經過去了近五十年。現在，西蒙的後裔賈斯特·貝爾蒙特必須獲得德古拉的遺物，以解開他兒時好友莉迪失踪的謎團。這座城堡迷人的神秘和危險等待著所有敢於進入的人。

Summon Night - Swordcraft Story (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Summon Night - Swordcraft Story (USA).original_desc: Summon Night: Swordcraft Story is an RPG set in the strange world of Lyndbaum, a sacred land linked to four magical dimensions from which Summoners can call forth spirits called Guardian Beasts to do their bidding.
Summon Night - Swordcraft Story (USA).desc: 官方Game Boy Advance平台的2,819款遊戲中，一塊遊戲卡匣的容量為0.5Mb至256Mb不等，其中以32Mb、64Mb及128Mb的遊戲作品最多。本列表共有1,074款Game Boy Advance遊戲。

Virtua Tennis (USA).name: Dreamcast
Virtua Tennis (USA).original_desc:
Virtua Tennis arrives on the GBA, without the 'Virtual' 3D element, but with the same gameplay you expect from a tennis game.

Choose from a male or female player (or create your own) and take to the world tour, competing in various tournaments on clay, hardcourt, grass or indoors. Play against some of the best players in the world, both in singles and doubles, or compete against your friends in 4 player doubles.

Mini-games test your skills and improves the timing of your shots. Games range from Burger Chef (aim at the grid to decide what comes next on the burger), Disc Shooter (similar to Othello) and Bull's Eye, where you aim for the center of the target. Your created character will also improve depending on your success in each mini-game, with his or her stats increasing over time.
Virtua Tennis (USA).desc:
Virtua Tennis 登陸 GBA，沒有“虛擬”3D 元素，但具有與網球遊戲相同的遊戲玩法。

選擇男性或女性玩家（或創建自己的玩家）並參加世界巡迴賽，在紅土、硬地、草地或室內的各種錦標賽中競爭。與世界上一些最好的選手進行單打和雙打比賽，或者與您的朋友進行 4 人雙打比賽。

迷你游戲可以測試您的技能並提高您的射擊時機。遊戲範圍包括 Burger Chef（瞄準網格來決定漢堡接下來會發生什麼）、Disc Shooter（類似於奧賽羅）和 Bull's Eye（您瞄準目標的中心）。你創建的角色也會根據你在每個迷你游戲中的成功而得到改善，他或她的統計數據會隨著時間的推移而增加。

Zone of the Enders - The Fist of Mars (U.key: Zone of the Enders - The Fist of Mars (USA)
Zone of the Enders - The Fist of Mars (U.original_name: Zone of the Enders : The Fist of Mars
Zone of the Enders - The Fist of Mars (U.name: 终极地带系列
Zone of the Enders - The Fist of Mars (U.original_desc: In the distant future, mankind is at the brink of war with it's colonies on the moon, Mars and Jupiter. You take control of a young man who, after a series of events, finds himself in possession of a new type of L.E.V. (a giant combat robot) and stranded on Mars, where he joins forces with the Anti-Terrestrial League.
Zone of the Enders - The Fist of Mars (U.desc: 在遙遠的未來，人類與月球、火星和木星上的殖民地正處於戰爭邊緣。你控制了一個年輕人，在發生一系列事件後，他發現自己擁有一種新型 L.E.V. （一個巨大的戰鬥機器人）並被困在火星上，在那裡他與反地球聯盟聯手。

Mega Man Battle Network 6 - Cybeast Greg.key: Mega Man Battle Network 6 - Cybeast Gregar (USA)
Mega Man Battle Network 6 - Cybeast Greg.original_name: Mega Man Battle Network 6 : Cybeast Gregar
Mega Man Battle Network 6 - Cybeast Greg.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Mega Man Battle Network 6 - Cybeast Greg.original_desc: In Mega Man Battle Network 6, Lan's father has received a job transfer and the family moves to Cyber City, a town known for conducting various technological experiments. Lan will meet new people and build new friendships in the real world while Mega Man befriends helpful Navis and encounters dangerous new enemies on the virtual plane. Together they will face threats far more powerful and perilous than they ever have before.
Mega Man Battle Network 6 - Cybeast Greg.desc: 在《洛克人戰網 6》中，蘭的父親得到了工作調動，全家搬到了以進行各種技術實驗而聞名的網絡城。Lan 將在現實世界中結識新朋友並建立新的友誼，而洛克人則與樂於助人的 Navis 成為朋友，並在虛擬飛機上遇到危險的新敵人。他們將共同面對比以往任何時候都更加強大和危險的威脅。

Street Fighter Alpha 3 (USA).name: 快打旋風ZERO
Street Fighter Alpha 3 (USA).original_desc:
Street Fighter Alpha 3, the third game in the Alpha series, has a total of 31 fighters, the most in the series so far. New characters include old favorites E. Honda, Blanka, Vega, Cammy, T. Hawk, Dee Jay, Juni and Juli. Some of the newest fighters on the block include a former Final Fight character (Cody, who has been in jail since the last Final Fight game, or so his clothing suggests), Karin Kanzuki and Rainbow Mika.

The major difference between this Alpha and the last two are the new play modes World Tour, Arcade, VS, Training and Entry. 

World Tour - Simply choose your fighter and travel around the world, fighting the home town heroes that you run into. The more fights you win, the stronger you fighter becomes. You can also learn new moves, and there are three levels of Super moves to choose from before you start each round (called Isms).

Arcade - A simple conversion of the arcade version. Beat each fighter with your chosen warrior, in three rounds per match (much the same as past versions of Street Fighter)

Versus - Two human players battle it out. 

Training - A good way to learn all the super moves that are available, against a dummy.

Entry - If you save your character during the World Tour mode, you can upload him here to use in the other modes in the game (especially handy for Training).

Finally, if you complete certain areas of the game three new fighters become available, including another old favourite in Guile, Evil Ryu and Shin Akuma.
Street Fighter Alpha 3 (USA).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼 PlayStation的電子遊戲。索尼PlayStation最早於1994年12月3日在日本推出，之後於1995年9月9日在北美推出。

Final Fight One (USA).name: 火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴4
Final Fight One (USA).original_desc: Classic arcade action is unleased on the Game Boy Advance system in Final Fight One. There's trouble in Metro City. The members of the Mad Gear Gang have kidnapped the mayor's daughter Jessica and the clock is ticking. The mayor, an ex-street fighter himself, calls in the big guns to help, enlisting the iron fist team of Cody and Guy. Now, it's a race against time to scour the city, defeat an army of the Mad Gear Gang's minions, and rescue Jessica before it's too late!
Final Fight One (USA).desc: 《Final Fight One》中的經典街機動作遊戲在 Game Boy Advance 系統上發布。美羅城有麻煩了。瘋狂裝備幫的成員綁架了市長的女兒傑西卡，時間緊迫。市長本人曾經是一名街頭霸王，他召集了大佬們來幫忙，並招募了科迪和蓋伊組成的鐵拳團隊。現在，我們正在與時間賽跑，搜尋這座城市，擊敗瘋狂齒輪幫的爪牙軍隊，並在為時已晚之前營救傑西卡！

Goemon - New Age Shutsudou! (Japan).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Goemon - New Age Shutsudou! (Japan).original_desc: Goemon: New Age Shutsudou! gives the franchise a facelift, putting Goemon and his friends in a futuristic rendition of Japan, fending off a supernatural force threatening the city.
Goemon - New Age Shutsudou! (Japan).desc: 五右衛門：新紀元戒堂！對該系列進行了改頭換面，讓五右衛門和他的朋友們置身於未來派的日本，抵禦威脅這座城市的超自然力量。

Mega Man Zero 4 (USA).name: 洛克人Zero (游戏)
Mega Man Zero 4 (USA).original_desc: The Zero Knuckle... the baddest new tool in Zero's arsenal lets you steal enemies' weapons and use them in battle. Employ this along with countless other cool moves to fight the Neo Arcadian army, defeat the evil Dr. Weil and help the caravan of humans reach the peace and security of Area Zero.
Mega Man Zero 4 (USA).desc: 零指關節...零的武器庫中最糟糕的新工具可以讓你竊取敵人的武器並在戰鬥中使用它們。使用這個以及無數其他酷炫動作來對抗新阿卡迪亞軍隊，擊敗邪惡的威爾博士並幫助人類商隊到達零區的和平與安全。

Jet Grind Radio (USA).name: Dreamcast
Jet Grind Radio (USA).original_desc:
The hip-hop Dreamcast hit makes it's way to the Game Boy Advance. Your favorite skaters from Jet Grind Radio return in true 3D blasting through exciting and diverse levels. Grab your spray cans and hit the streets painting the town in your colors while avoiding the cops and rival gangs. It's not easy being a kid in Tokyo but with your Overdrive Magnetic-Motor Skates and a need for self-expression you're on your way to making the town yours!

Features multiple game modes including one-on-one races, freestyle skating for points, timed tagging sessions and multiple playable characters that have a completely unique look and feel, power-ups that allow you, the skater, to have extra powers.
Jet Grind Radio (USA).desc:
嘻哈 Dreamcast 熱門歌曲登陸 Game Boy Advance。Jet Grind Radio 中您最喜愛的滑手將通過激動人心且多樣化的關卡以真正的 3D 方式回歸。拿起你的噴霧罐，走上街頭，將小鎮塗成你的顏色，同時避開警察和敵對幫派。在東京做一個孩子並不容易，但憑藉您的超速磁力溜冰鞋和自我表達的需求，您正在踏上將這座小鎮變成您自己的道路！

具有多種遊戲模式，包括一對一比賽、自由式滑冰得分、定時標記會話和多個具有完全獨特外觀和感覺的可玩角色，以及讓滑冰者擁有額外能力的能力提升。

Mega Man Battle Network 5 - Team Protoma.key: Mega Man Battle Network 5 - Team Protoman (USA)
Mega Man Battle Network 5 - Team Protoma.original_name: Mega Man Battle Network 5 : Team ProtoMan
Mega Man Battle Network 5 - Team Protoma.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Mega Man Battle Network 5 - Team Protoma.original_desc: Team Protoman is the first edition of Mega Man Battle Network 5. In the game, you can join forces with characters from previous installments of the Mega Man Battle series, and you can play in a new fighting mode. Team up with other cyberheroes in an effort to stop an evil organization from taking control of the global Internet.
Mega Man Battle Network 5 - Team Protoma.desc: Team Protoman 是《Mega Man Battle Network 5》的第一版。在遊戲中，您可以與《Mega Man Battle Network》系列之前作品中的角色聯手，並可以玩新的戰鬥模式。與其他網絡英雄合作，阻止邪惡組織控制全球互聯網。

V-Rally 3 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).name: Game Source Entertainment
V-Rally 3 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).original_desc:
The rally racing series comes to the GBA with texture mapped 3d graphics that take the GBA in a direction never thought possible.
Players can choose from a variety of game modes including rally racing, circuit racing and time trials or link up and go head to head with another player. The better and further you get the more cars and tracks are unlocked.
View the race from inside the car or behind it as you scream through snow, rain, fog, dirt, gravel and over jumps at different times of day and night as you try to become the best rally racer on the planet.
Features battery backup.
V-Rally 3 (USA) (En,Fr,Es).desc:
Dreamcast（日語：ドリームキャスト，簡稱為DC）是日本電子遊戲商SEGA於1998年11月27日在日本、1999年9月9日在北美、1999年10月14日在歐洲發行的家用遊戲機，為第六世代電子遊戲機中第一部推出的主機，也是SEGA開發的最後一部家用遊戲機。主要競爭對手包括索尼的PlayStation 2、任天堂的任天堂GameCube及微軟的Xbox。
與前代主機SEGA土星不同，Dreamcast採用了日立的SH-4中央處理器（CPU）及VideoLogic/日本電氣的PowerVR2圖形處理器（GPU）等現成組件取代客製化組件，藉以降低成本。儘管Dreamcast在北美地區發售初期頗有斬獲，但在索尼力推其PlayStation 2之後，Dreamcast主機銷量便逐漸滑落；在銷量長期低迷的情況下，SEGA的財務損失持續擴大。在改組領導層之後，SEGA最終在2001年1月31日宣布於3月底終止Dreamcast硬體製造及開發、全面退出家用遊戲機硬體市場，並改組為純第三方遊戲開發商。Dreamcast在其生命週期中銷量僅有約1000萬部，是SEGA最重大的商業失敗之一。
雖然Dreamcast的生命週期不長、第三方遊戲有限，但輿論普遍認為Dreamcast是一部超前時代的主機。Dreamcast擁有《瘋狂計程車》、《Jet Set Radio》和《莎木》系列等創意十足的獨占遊戲，以及一些來自SEGA自有大型電玩系統NAOMI的高品質移植作品。Dreamcast也是第一部內建撥接網路並提供原生網路遊戲的家用遊戲機。

Final Fantasy V Advance (USA).name: 最终幻想V
Final Fantasy V Advance (USA).original_desc: The winds fail. Ships stand still, unable to fill their sails. The world races to its end. Unless a handful of heroes can protect the remaining crystals, the world will fall into ruin. Set off on a grand adventure in the finest version of FINAL FANTASY V ever released!
Final Fantasy V Advance (USA).desc: 風失敗了。船靜止不動，無法揚帆。世界正競相走向末日。除非少數英雄能夠保護剩餘的水晶，否則世界將陷入毀滅。在史上最優秀的《最終幻想 V》版本中踏上一場盛大的冒險！

Final Fantasy IV Advance (USA).name: 最終幻想IV
Final Fantasy IV Advance (USA).original_desc: This classic adventure includes 18 towns and castles, dozens of magical spells, and hundreds of monsters, weapons, and items to help players on their quests. The game features the astounding music, challenging adventures, and interesting storyline that are the hallmarks of the Final Fantasy franchise. Additional game elements also have been added to enhance the Game Boy Advance version.
Final Fantasy IV Advance (USA).desc: 這個經典的冒險包括 18 個城鎮和城堡、數十種魔法咒語以及數百種怪物、武器和物品，以幫助玩家完成任務。該遊戲具有令人驚嘆的音樂、富有挑戰性的冒險和有趣的故事情節，這些都是《最終幻想》系列的標誌。還添加了其他遊戲元素來增強 Game Boy Advance 版本。

Harvest Moon - More Friends of Mineral T.key: Harvest Moon - More Friends of Mineral Town (USA)
Harvest Moon - More Friends of Mineral T.original_name: Harvest Moon : More Friends of Mineral Town
Harvest Moon - More Friends of Mineral T.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Harvest Moon - More Friends of Mineral T.original_desc: Live the simple life as a farmer in Harvest Moon: More Friends of Mineral Town. This game is similar to the original Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town, but now you can play as a girl who has left the city to pursue a life on the farm. You'll take part in growing crops, managing livestock, finding a husband, and raising children.
Harvest Moon - More Friends of Mineral T.desc: 在《牧場物語：礦物鎮的更多朋友》中過著農民的簡單生活。這款遊戲與原版《牧場物語：礦物鎮之友》類似，但現在你可以扮演一個離開城市去追求農場生活的女孩。你將參與種植農作物、管理牲畜、尋找丈夫和撫養孩子。

Spyro 2 - Season of Flame (USA).name: Xbox 360游戏列表
Spyro 2 - Season of Flame (USA).original_desc: Spyro 2: Season of Flame tells the story of Spyro's return to the Dragon Realms where he is surprised to discover that a mysterious enemy has stolen the Fireflies, the source of all dragon firepower, including Spyro's. Now it is up to everyone's favorite purple dragon to save the Fireflies before it is too late!
Spyro 2 - Season of Flame (USA).desc: 《小龍斯派羅 2：火焰季節》講述了小斯派羅回到龍之國度的故事，他驚訝地發現一個神秘的敵人偷走了螢火蟲，螢火蟲是包括小龍斯派羅在內的所有龍火力的源泉。現在輪到大家最喜歡的紫龍來拯救螢火蟲了，以免為時已晚！

Sonic Advance 3 (USA) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es,It.name: 畅销电子游戏列表
Sonic Advance 3 (USA) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es,It.original_desc:
Eggman has broken the world into seven parts, now the player must find the seven Chaos Emeralds to restore the world. 

Sonic Advance 3 is a Sonic game with a twist: the player can play with a friend in co-op mode or one of many multi-player modes like ring race. The game contains features from Sonic Advance and Sonic Advance 2, but with more options like choosing from 2 characters in story mode (a leading and a following character).
Sonic Advance 3 (USA) (En,Ja,Fr,De,Es,It.desc:
蛋頭博士已將世界分成七部分，現在玩家必須找到七顆混沌翡翠來恢復世界。

Sonic Advance 3 是一款有特色的索尼克遊戲：玩家可以在合作模式中與朋友一起玩，也可以選擇多種多人遊戲模式（例如環形競賽）。該遊戲包含《Sonic Advance》和《Sonic Advance 2》的功能，但還有更多選項，例如在故事模式中從 2 個角色中進行選擇（主角和跟隨角色）。

Mega Man & Bass (USA).name: 主机大战
Mega Man & Bass (USA).original_desc:
The mighty robot King has taken over Dr. Wily's base, invaded the Robot Museum, and stolen 100 CDs containing secret robot plans, hoping to create the ultimate unstoppable army of robots! And to make matters worse, he's sent 8 robot masters to prove his new-found power!

Mega Man is the only one who can stop him...or so he thought! Bass, Dr. Wily's greatest creation and Mega Man's sworn rival, is actually fighting ALONGSIDE Mega Man for once! Of course, it's only to prove that he's the strongest robot ever made, and he'll do it by smashing King's army of mechanical maniacs!

Now, Mega Man and Bass are heading out to get back all of the CD's that King stole. Run, jump, slide, dash, and blast your way through to destroy this new menace!
Mega Man & Bass (USA).desc:
強大的機器人國王占領了威利博士的基地，入侵了機器人博物館，並偷走了 100 張包含秘密機器人計劃的 CD，希望打造出終極不可阻擋的機器人大軍！更糟糕的是，他還派出了 8 名機器人大師來證明他新發現的力量！

洛克人是唯一能阻止他的人……至少他是這麼認為的！威利博士最偉大的創造物和洛克人的死敵巴斯，實際上正在與洛克人並肩作戰一次！當然，這只是為了證明他是有史以來最強大的機器人，他會通過粉碎國王的機械狂人軍隊來做到這一點！

現在，洛克人和巴斯正出發去取回金偷走的所有 CD。奔跑、跳躍、滑行、衝刺和爆破，消滅這個新的威脅！

WarioWare, Inc. - Mega Microgame$! (USA).name: 马力欧医生
WarioWare, Inc. - Mega Microgame$! (USA).original_desc: Frantic action! Prepare for lightning-quick game play as you blaze through over 200 bizarre microgames designed by a crazy crew of Wario's cronies! There are even two-player contests that can be played on a single Game Boy Advance! Pick up and play! Ultra-simple controls make each game easy to get into...until the games start coming faster... and faster...and FASTER!
WarioWare, Inc. - Mega Microgame$! (USA).desc: 瘋狂行動！準備好享受快如閃電的遊戲體驗吧，暢玩由瓦里奧的一群瘋狂親信設計的 200 多個奇異的微型遊戲！甚至還可以在一台 Game Boy Advance 上進行兩人比賽！拿起玩吧！超簡單的控制讓每個遊戲都很容易上手...直到遊戲開始變得越來越快...越來越快...越來越快！

WarioWare - Twisted! (USA).name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
WarioWare - Twisted! (USA).original_desc: After accidentally discovering spin technology, Wario reassembles the developers at WarioWare, Inc. to make a new set of wild minigames. WarioWare: Twisted! maintains the fast-paced style of gameplay from the original WarioWare and introduces a new gyro sensor that lets you control the gameplay by rotating the Game Boy Advance SP left and right. The new controls play into more than 200 minigames. Play through them all to unlock souvenirs, such as bonus games, figurines, and instruments.
WarioWare - Twisted! (USA).desc: 在意外發現旋轉技術後，瓦里奧重新召集了瓦里奧軟件公司的開發人員，製作了一套新的狂野迷你游戲。瓦里奧軟件：扭曲！保留了原始 WarioWare 的快節奏遊戲風格，並引入了新的陀螺儀傳感器，讓您可以通過左右旋轉 Game Boy Advance SP 來控制遊戲玩法。新的控件可用於 200 多個迷你游戲。通關所有關卡即可解鎖紀念品，例如獎勵遊戲、雕像和樂器。

Max Payne (USA).name: 英雄本色3
Max Payne (USA).original_desc:
Max Payne lost his family to death. Now he is seeking revenge. In the lore of the original PC hit, Max Payne on the Game Boy Advance follows Max's story as he attempts to take down the crime lords who tried to destroy his life.

Unlike the original, the GBA version uses an isometric perspective to present the action. Various weapons are offered to dispatch the guys (or girls) who get in your way, and by using bullet time, you can slow down time and increase your chances of avoiding incoming fire and hitting the target.
Max Payne (USA).desc:
索塞克斯公爵哈利王子（英語：Prince Harry, Duke of Sussex，1984年9月15日—），全名為亨利·查爾斯·阿爾伯特·大衛（英語：Henry Charles Albert David），是英國王室成員。作為查爾斯三世與威爾斯王妃黛安娜的次子，他在英國王位繼承順序中排名第五。
哈利曾先後就讀於韋瑟比學校、拉德格羅夫學校及伊頓公學，後於桑德赫斯特皇家軍事學院完成軍官訓練。他以少尉軍銜加入皇家藍色騎兵團，並曾與兄長威爾斯親王威廉短暫共事。哈利曾兩次被派往阿富汗前線服役：第一次是2007年至2008年間在赫爾曼德省為期十週的部署，第二次則是2012年至2013年作為英國陸軍航空團成員進行為期二十週的任務。
受美國勇士運動會啟發，哈利於2014年創辦勇士不敗運動會並擔任創始贊助人，至今仍積極參與相關事務。兩年後，他與兄長威廉及嫂子威爾斯王妃凱薩琳共同發起關注心理健康的「同心協力」（Heads Together）倡議活動。
2018年，哈利在與美國女演員梅根·馬克爾舉行婚禮前獲封索塞克斯公爵。二人育有兩名子女：亞契與莉莉白。2020年1月，哈利與梅根退出王室高級成員行列，遷居梅根的家鄉南加州，並成立總部位於比佛利山莊、混合營利與非營利性質的企業亞契威爾。2021年3月，哈利與妻子接受奧花·雲費專訪的電視特輯《奧花與哈利梅根的訪談》引發廣泛關注。夫婦二人還參與拍攝了Netflix紀錄片《哈利與梅根》，該片於2022年12月上映。

Super Robot Taisen R (Japan) (Translated.name: PlayStation游戏列表
Super Robot Taisen R (Japan) (Translated.original_desc: Raul/Fiona and their two friends test out their machine, the Excellence, but are attacked in the middle of the test and the base is totaled. They send out an SOS, which is received by the Ra Calium and the Nadesico. Who will survive?
Super Robot Taisen R (Japan) (Translated.desc: 勞爾/菲奧娜和他們的兩個朋友測試了他們的機器“卓越”，但在測試過程中遭到攻擊，基地被徹底摧毀。他們發出求救信號，Ra Calium 和 Nadesico 收到該信號。誰能活下來？

Mega Man Battle Network 3 - Blue Version.key: Mega Man Battle Network 3 - Blue Version (USA)
Mega Man Battle Network 3 - Blue Version.original_name: Mega Man Battle Network 3 : Blue Version
Mega Man Battle Network 3 - Blue Version.name: 刺猬索尼克 (1991年游戏)
Mega Man Battle Network 3 - Blue Version.original_desc: Join MegaMan.EXE, his operator Lan, and friends as they keep the net safe from viruses and cyber menaces. You'll travel through new virtual and real worlds, fight new bosses, interact with new characters, and even find new Battle Chips. It's cyber mayhem at its best! Mega Man Battle Network 3 has two unique versions: Blue and White. Each version contains unique Battle Chips, characters, and styles for MegaMan.EXE to use.
Mega Man Battle Network 3 - Blue Version.desc: 與 MegaMan.EXE、他的操作員 Lan 和朋友們一起保護網絡免受病毒和網絡威脅的侵害。你將穿越新的虛擬和現實世界，對抗新的老闆，與新的角色互動，甚至找到新的戰鬥籌碼。這是最好的網絡混亂！《洛克人戰網 3》有兩個獨特的版本：藍色和白色。每個版本都包含獨特的戰鬥籌碼、角色和風格，供 MegaMan.EXE 使用。

Pokemon - Emerald Version (USA, Europe).name: 寶可夢系列 (遊戲)
Pokemon - Emerald Version (USA, Europe).original_desc:
The Hoenn region is unstable--Rayquaza has awakened! Your skills as a Trainer will be challenged like they've never been challenged before as you try to maintain the balance between Kyogre & Groudon. Prove your skills by earning badges & gaining access to the Battle Frontier--the front line of Pokémon battling that offers a whole new level of competition. Never-before-experienced battles await you!

-The third adventure with new episodes in the Hoenn region!
-Tons of new features, including surprising plot twists and changes to where and how often you can catch certain Pokémon!
-Use the Game Boy Advance Wireless Adapter to trade & battle between Pokémon Emerald and Pokémon FireRed & LeafGreen versions.
-Expand your collection when you trade with a friend. Using a Game Link cable, link up with Pokémon Ruby & Sapphire, Pokémon FireRed & LeafGreen or Pokémon Colosseum to catch them all! See instruction booklet for details.
Pokemon - Emerald Version (USA, Europe).desc:
豐緣地區不穩定——烈空座甦醒了！當你試圖保持蓋歐卡和固拉多之間的平衡時，你作為訓練師的技能將受到前所未有的挑戰。通過贏得徽章和進入戰鬥前沿來證明你的技能——神奇寶貝戰鬥的前線提供了全新的競爭水平。前所未有的戰斗等待著你！

-豐緣地區的第三次冒險，有新情節！
-大量新功能，包括令人驚訝的情節曲折以及捕捉某些神奇寶貝的地點和頻率的變化！
- 使用 Game Boy Advance 無線適配器在 Pokémon Emerald 和 Pokémon FireRed & LeafGreen 版本之間進行交易和戰鬥。
- 與朋友交易時擴大您的收藏。使用 Game Link 電纜，連接 Pokémon Ruby & Sapphire、Pokémon FireRed & LeafGreen 或 Pokémon Colosseum 將它們全部捕獲！詳情請參閱說明書。

Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 (USA, Europe).name: GameSpot
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 (USA, Europe).original_desc:
THPS4 is the fourth game in Activision's ever popular franchise.

The main feature of this game is it's redesigned career mode.  When beginning a level, you have all the time in the world to skate around, perform tricks, get a feel for the level, without the hassel of any goals or time limits.  When you're ready to attempt a goal, simply find a pro skater, talk to him, then receive the goal, similar to Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX.  Goals are similar to the previous games, such as collect SKATE, get a certain amount of points, transfer over this and grind that.  There are new goals, however, such as collecting the word COMBO while doing one big combo.  Miss a trick, and goal fails.  Once all regular goals are accomplished, you can attempt the Pro Goal, which is specific to each skater, and is extremely hard.

All the major skaters are here, including Tony Hawk, Bob Burnquist, Steve Caballero, Kareem Campbell, Rune Gilfberg, Eric Koston, Bucky Lasek, Bam Margera, Rodney Mullen, Chad Muska, Andrew Reynolds, Geoff Rowley, Elissa Steamer and Jamie Thomas.

The levels are been expanded and are huge.  Some of the levels include a college campus, a shipyard, and the infamous prison complex Alcatraz.

For multiplayer, all the favorite modes are back, from Graffiti and Trick Attack to Horse and King Of The Hill.  New modes include Capture The Flag and Combo Mambo.  THPS4 also supports System Link play, but not XBox Live.

The PlayStation 2 version offers everything from the XBox version, but also has online play, utilizing either your own network adaptor or the official one.  The PS2 version also features a one level demo of Shaun Murray's Pro Wakeboarder, which is not featured on any other version of the game.
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4 (USA, Europe).desc:
THPS4 是動視公司廣受歡迎的系列中的第四款遊戲。

該遊戲的主要特點是重新設計的職業模式。當開始一個關卡時，你有足夠的時間到處滑冰、表演特技、感受關卡，沒有任何目標或時間限制的麻煩。當您準備好嘗試實現目標時，只需找到一名職業滑冰運動員，與他交談，然後接收目標，類似於 Dave Mirra 自由式 BMX。目標和之前的遊戲類似，比如收集SKATE、獲得一定的積分、轉這個、磨那個。然而，還有新的目標，例如在進行一個大連擊時收集“COMBO”一詞。錯過一招，進球就會失敗。完成所有常規目標後，您可以嘗試專業目標，這是針對每個滑冰者的特定目標，並且非常困難。

所有主要的滑冰運動員都在這裡，包括托尼·霍克、鮑勃·伯恩奎斯特、史蒂夫·卡瓦列羅、卡里姆·坎貝爾、魯恩·吉爾夫伯格、埃里克·科斯頓、巴基·拉塞克、巴姆·馬格拉、羅德尼·馬倫、查德·穆斯卡、安德魯·雷諾茲、傑夫·羅利、艾麗莎·斯蒂默和傑米·托馬斯。

級別已擴大且巨大。部分關卡包括大學校園、造船廠和臭名昭著的惡魔島監獄。

對於多人遊戲，所有最受歡迎的模式都回來了，從塗鴉和特技攻擊到騎馬和山丘之王。新模式包括“奪旗”和“組合曼波”。THPS4 還支持 System Link 播放，但不支持 Xbox Live。

PlayStation 2 版本提供 Xbox 版本的所有內容，而且還可以使用您自己的網絡適配器或官方網絡適配器進行在線遊戲。PS2 版本還包含 Shaun Murray 的 Pro Wakeboarder 的一級演示，該遊戲在任何其他版本中均未提供。

Pokemon Pinball - Ruby & Sapphire (USA).name: 畅销Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Pokemon Pinball - Ruby & Sapphire (USA).original_desc: Pokémon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire has all the features you'd demand of a pinball game, including bonus tables, lots of bumpers and ways to score massive points. As with your standard pinball video game, the left button on the D-pad and the A-button control the flippers with the R/L triggers used to shake the table. The catch here is that everything is themed in Pokémon. Instead of a ball, you make use of a Pokéball. Instead of standard bumpers, you're hitting the Pokéball against other Pokémon, and the ultimate goal is of course to "catch 'em all". The game features 200 Pokémon, two main tables, and link cable support.
Pokemon Pinball - Ruby & Sapphire (USA).desc: 《神奇寶貝彈球：紅寶石與藍寶石》擁有彈球遊戲所需的所有功能，包括獎金表、大量保險槓以及獲得大量積分的方法。與標準彈球視頻遊戲一樣，方向鍵上的左側按鈕和 A 按鈕控制腳蹼，並使用 R/L 觸發器來搖動桌子。這裡的問題是一切都以神奇寶貝為主題。你可以使用神奇球來代替球。你不是用標準的保險槓，而是用神奇寶貝球對抗其他神奇寶貝，最終目標當然是“抓住它們”。遊戲擁有 200 個神奇寶貝、兩個主桌和連接線支持。

Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga (USA).name: 马力欧与路易吉RPG
Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga (USA).original_desc: An evil witch has replaced Princess Peach's fair speech with explosives! Mario and Luigi must once again come to her rescue, but this time they employ the help of Bowser, their sworn enemy. Mario and Luigi must learn new moves and combine powers to fight off enemies and move closer to the witch's castle. Guide this unlikely bunch through an abundance of minigames such as Border Jump and Mystery Carts. Combine the powers of Mario and Luigi to pull off special tag-team moves. Immerse yourself in this bright, cartoonish, and humorous world, complete with hit music featured in previous Mario games.
Mario & Luigi - Superstar Saga (USA).desc: 邪惡的女巫用炸藥取代了桃子公主的公平演講！馬里奧和路易吉必須再次營救她，但這一次他們得到了死敵鮑澤的幫助。馬里奧和路易吉必須學習新動作並結合力量來擊退敵人並靠近女巫的城堡。引導這群看似不太可能的人玩各種迷你游戲，例如“邊境跳躍”和“神秘車”。結合馬里奧和路易吉的力量，完成特殊的雙打動作。讓自己沉浸在這個明亮、卡通和幽默的世界中，並享受以前的馬里奧遊戲中的熱門音樂。

Ninja Five-0 (USA).name: Game Source Entertainment
Ninja Five-0 (USA).original_desc:
Take on the role of Ninja Five-O as he uses all his skill, stealth and magic to rescue hostages and defeat his enemies. Master the art of ninja swords, shuriken throwing stars and ancient ninjitsu magic!

* Kaginawa Wire grappling hook that can be used to hang, fly, jump, climb walls and surprise attack.
* 6 Challenging missions covering 20 levels.
* Crush objects to find hidden Power-Ups and secret items
* Unique enemy boss characters for each level.
Ninja Five-0 (USA).desc:
扮演忍者五人組，使用他所有的技能、潛行和魔法來營救人質並擊敗敵人。掌握忍者劍、飛鏢和古代忍術魔法的藝術！

* Kaginawa 鋼絲抓鉤，可用於懸掛、飛行、跳躍、爬牆和奇襲。
* 6 個具有挑戰性的任務，涵蓋 20 個級別。
* 粉碎物體來尋找隱藏的強化道具和秘密物品
* 每個級別都有獨特的敵人頭目角色。

Worms World Party (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).name: Game Source Entertainment
Worms World Party (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).original_desc:
The Worms are back, deadlier than ever.
You're going to learn that there's nothing more dangerous than a Worm with a bazooka or a shotgun...

At first sight, Worms World Party may seem very similar to Worms Armageddon. However, this time the game has been specially designed with multiplayer in mind. Up to 6 players can battle out at the same time on local networks or on the internet, using Team17 own matchmaking service, called Wormnet.

Other welcomed additions are the Wormpot, which can provide 400 gameplay variations from "Goliath Mode" to "Bleeding Worms", hundreds of new landscapes, flags and fanfares, and a load of single player missions.
Worms World Party (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).desc:
蠕蟲又回來了，而且比以往更加致命。
你將了解到沒有什麼比拿著火箭筒或霰彈槍的蠕蟲更危險了......

乍一看，《百戰天虫世界派對》可能與《百戰天虫世界末日》非常相似。然而，這一次的遊戲是專門為多人遊戲而設計的。使用 Team17 自己的配對服務（稱為 Wormnet），最多 6 名玩家可以在本地網絡或互聯網上同時對戰。

其他受歡迎的新增內容包括 Wormpot，它可以提供從“歌利亞模式”到“流血蠕蟲”的 400 種遊戲玩法變化、數百種新景觀、旗幟和號角，以及大量單人任務。

Car Battler Joe (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Car Battler Joe (USA).original_desc: Rampaging rogues roam the highways and byways that surround your village. If your believed the rumors, you would blame your missing father for the surge in vehicular violence. That's why you've decided to lead the life of a car battler, transporting cargo between towns and running down every lethal lead foot foolish enough to cross your path. This gritty work isn't easy. Other car battlers fight for money or fame, but you have a higher calling: You're determined to restore your family's lost honor and bring your father home.
Car Battler Joe (USA).desc: 狂暴的盜賊在村莊周圍的高速公路和小路上游盪。如果你相信這些謠言，你就會將車輛暴力事件的激增歸咎於你失踪的父親。這就是為什麼你決定過上汽車戰士的生活，在城鎮之間運輸貨物，並撞倒每一個愚蠢到橫穿你道路的致命前腳。這項艱鉅的工作並不容易。其他賽車手為金錢或名譽而戰，但你有更高的使命：你決心恢復家人失去的榮譽，並將你的父親帶回家。

Alien Hominid (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).name: 独立游戏节
Alien Hominid (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).original_desc:
Alien Hominid is a 2D side-scrolling shooter with heavy references to the Metal Slug series of games - from the hand-drawn graphics, huge explosions, right down to the ability to eviscerate FBI Agents when you get up close to them. The graphics are by featured artist Dan Paladin. Your goal, is quite simply, to get to the end of the stage, and die as little as possible. Which is made difficult due to the fact that any bullet is an instant kill.

To help you out, you can grab a range of power-ups, such as lasers, spread shots, shotguns and more, as well as hijacking vehicles and using them for protection. Grenades can be lobbed, and you can jump on enemy shoulders and choose to bite their heads off if you like, or pick them up and throw them at other enemies. You can also dive underground for a short period of time to avoid enemies - while underground, you can drag agents into the ground to kill them.
Alien Hominid (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It).desc:
Alien Hominid 是一款 2D 橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，大量參考了《合金彈頭》系列遊戲 - 從手繪圖形、巨大爆炸，到靠近 FBI 特工時將其開膛破肚的能力。這些圖形由特色藝術家丹·帕拉丁 (Dan Paladin) 創作。你的目標很簡單，就是到達舞台的盡頭，並儘可能少地死掉。由於任何子彈都會立即殺死，因此這變得很困難。

為了幫助你擺脫困境，你可以獲取一系列能量道具，例如激光、散彈、霰彈槍等，以及劫持車輛並使用它們進行保護。手榴彈可以投擲，你可以跳到敵人的肩膀上，如果你願意的話可以選擇咬掉他們的頭，或者撿起它們扔向其他敵人。你還可以短時間潛入地下來躲避敵人——在地下時，你可以將特工拖入地下殺死他們。

Harvest Moon - Friends of Mineral Town (.key: Harvest Moon - Friends of Mineral Town (USA)
Harvest Moon - Friends of Mineral Town (.original_name: Harvest Moon : Friends of Mineral Town
Harvest Moon - Friends of Mineral Town (.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Harvest Moon - Friends of Mineral Town (.original_desc: As a child, you spent a memorable summer on a farm in the country and experience a whole new world of excitement. Years have passed, and now the long-neglected farm that holds fond memories is yours! It is up to you to successfully rejuvenate the farm and build a life for yourself. The best part is that you can do it any way you want! Plant and harvest crops, raise farm animals, marry the woman of your dreams, and start a family! Take over the reins of life, and create your own pastoral adventure!
Harvest Moon - Friends of Mineral Town (.desc: 當你還是個孩子的時候，你在鄉村的一個農場度過了一個難忘的夏天，體驗了一個全新的興奮世界。多年過去了，現在這個長期被忽視、充滿美好回憶的農場是你的了！成功地振興農場並為自己創造生活取決於你。最好的部分是您可以隨心所欲地做！種植和收穫莊稼，飼養農場動物，娶你夢想中的女人，組建家庭！掌控生活，創造你自己的田園冒險！

Super Monkey Ball Jr. (USA).name: 網路爆紅列表
Super Monkey Ball Jr. (USA).original_desc:
Based on the Gamecube series of the same name, Super Monkey Ball Jr. has you in control of 3D style arenas, each with a varying degree of difficulty and objectives. Your little monkey, inside a ball, relies on your movement of the arena to get to the required objectives (collecting items, getting to the finish line in under a certain time limit, etc.).

Apart from the single player puzzle experience (which includes more then 60 arenas), up to four people can play a collection of mini-games (which you must unlock in the single player game). Play monkey bowling (aka ten pin bowling), monkey fight (knock the other 3 players' monkey ball out of the circle arena) or an 18 hole mini golf challenge.
Super Monkey Ball Jr. (USA).desc:
《Super Monkey Ball Jr.》以同名 Gamecube 系列為基礎，讓您掌控 3D 風格的競技場，每個競技場都有不同的難度和目標。你的小猴子在一個球內，依靠你在競技場的移動來達到所需的目標（收集物品、在一定的時間限制內到達終點線等）。

除了單人解謎體驗（包括 60 多個競技場）之外，最多四個人可以玩一系列迷你游戲（您必須在單人遊戲中解鎖）。玩猴子保齡球（又稱十瓶保齡球）、猴子大戰（將其他 3 名玩家的猴子球擊出圓形競技場）或 18 洞迷你高爾夫挑戰。

Racing Gears Advance (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Racing Gears Advance (USA).original_desc:
This handheld racing game offers a range of licensed cars, several courses and circuits, and a challenging set of opponents. To these stock elements, it adds one more: weaponry. Now you can choose to nitro past the opponent ahead of you, or slow him down with a missile.

With each vehicle and driver pair you can race in Practice Mode to familiarize yourself with tracks or choose a Championship Mode to progress through a series of circuits. After each race you'll need to spend some of the money you've earned (either by placing or picking up money icons during the race) to repair and -- if possible -- upgrade your car. The upgrades can improve your car as a racing machine (e.g. a larger engine or better brakes) or as a war machine (e.g. adding more weapons bays or buying a new type of weapon).

The track design uses the isometric view, and almost never puts the car behind an obstacle. However, among the twisty roads are a few shortcuts that require you to think outside the lines of the road, and occasionally take a leap of faith.
Racing Gears Advance (USA).desc:
這款掌上賽車遊戲提供了一系列授權汽車、多個賽道和賽道以及一組具有挑戰性的對手。除了這些庫存元素之外，它還添加了一項：武器。現在你可以選擇硝基超過你前面的對手，或者用導彈減慢他的速度。

對於每對車輛和車手，您可以在練習模式下比賽以熟悉賽道，或選擇錦標賽模式以在一系列賽道上前進。每場比賽結束後，你需要花費一些你賺到的錢（通過在比賽期間放置或拾取金錢圖標）來修理和（如果可能的話）升級你的汽車。升級可以將您的汽車改進為賽車機器（例如更大的發動機或更好的製動器）或戰爭機器（例如添加更多武器艙或購買新型武器）。

賽道設計採用等軸測視圖，幾乎不會將賽車置於障礙物後面。然而，在曲折的道路中，有一些捷徑需要你跳出道路思考，並偶爾進行一次信念的飛躍。

Pokemon - FireRed Version (USA, Europe).name: 寶可夢系列 (遊戲)
Pokemon - FireRed Version (USA, Europe).original_desc: In this adventure, you travel through the Kanto region, form a close bond with your Pokémon, and catch various species to complete the Pokédex. Challenge other trainers, stand up to Team Rocket, and battle the Gym Leaders to earn all eight badges. With these in your possession, you can take on the Elite Four and ultimately face the reigning Champion in a final, decisive battle. Your goal: Become the best trainer and catch them all!
Pokemon - FireRed Version (USA, Europe).desc: 在這次冒險中，你穿越關東地區，與你的神奇寶貝建立密切的聯繫，並捕捉各種物種來完成神奇寶貝圖鑑。挑戰其他訓練師，對抗火箭隊，並與道館領袖作戰，以獲得全部八枚徽章。有了這些，您就可以與精英四強並最終在最後的決定性戰鬥中面對衛冕冠軍。你的目標：成為最好的訓練家並抓住他們！

Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.key: Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Past & Four Swords (USA)
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.original_name: The Legend of Zelda : A Link to the Past & Four Swords
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.original_desc:
The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past & Four Swords for Game Boy Advance is a remake of A Link to the Past coupled with an entirely new game, Four Swords. This two-in-one game was released shortly before The Wind Waker.

While A Link to the Past is largely a faithful port of the original, it does include an entirely new dungeon and a new quest as rewards for the player playing through the multiplayer-only Four Swords. Aside from these additions, it includes a number of smaller gameplay and dialogue changes, the latter of which are designed to correct a number of minor translation mistakes and inconsistencies with the original Japanese release and to unify the common terms used with the later games.
Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Pas.desc:
Game Boy Advance 的《塞爾達傳說：眾神的三角力量》和《四劍》是《眾神的三角力量》的重製版，加上全新的遊戲《四劍》。這款二合一遊戲在《風之杖》之前不久發布。

雖然《眾神的三角力量》在很大程度上是原作的忠實移植版，但它確實包括一個全新的地下城和一個新的任務，作為玩僅限多人遊戲的《四劍》玩家的獎勵。除了這些新增內容之外，它還包括一些較小的遊戲玩法和對話更改，後者旨在糾正一些較小的翻譯錯誤以及與原始日語版本的不一致之處，並統一後來游戲中使用的常用術語。

Mega Man Battle Network 4 - Red Sun (USA.key: Mega Man Battle Network 4 - Red Sun (USA)
Mega Man Battle Network 4 - Red Sun (USA.original_name: Mega Man Battle Network 4 : Red Sun
Mega Man Battle Network 4 - Red Sun (USA.name: 網路爆紅列表
Mega Man Battle Network 4 - Red Sun (USA.original_desc: The fourth installment in the Mega Man Battle Network series comes in two versions--Red Sun and Blue Moon--each with different enemies, battle chips, souls, and characters. Once again, you assume the role of Lan as he and his friend, Mega Man.exe, fight to rid the Internet of viruses and other cyberworld enemies. Unlike previous games in the series, Mega Man Battle Network 4 focuses on a tournament system where players encounter a variety of enemies that must be defeated. A new Soul Unison system lets Mega Man transform into his defeated enemies.
Mega Man Battle Network 4 - Red Sun (USA.desc: 《洛克人戰網》系列的第四部分有兩個版本——紅日和藍月——每個版本都有不同的敵人、戰鬥籌碼、靈魂和角色。您再次扮演 Lan 的角色，與他的朋友 Mega Man.exe 一起努力消滅互聯網上的病毒和其他網絡世界的敵人。與該系列之前的遊戲不同，《洛克人戰網 4》專注於錦標賽系統，玩家會遇到各種必須擊敗的敵人。新的靈魂統一系統讓洛克人變身為他擊敗的敵人。

Sonic Pinball Party (USA) (En,Ja,Fr,De,E.name: 刺猬索尼克系列
Sonic Pinball Party (USA) (En,Ja,Fr,De,E.original_desc:
Sonic Pinball Party is the second Sonic Pinball game since Sonic Spinball in the early 90's. The game has an arcade mode, a tutorial mode, and a vs mode (party mode). In the game the game has pinball tables of famous Sonic Team characters such as Nights, Samba de Amigo, and of course SONIC! 

The story mode of the game is the usual type of story, Robotnik steals animals visiting Casinopolis, and is going turn into his Robotic slaves. Of course, Sonic is going to try and stop him. Before he does, he has to win a pinball competition and during the game you unlock prizes. The competition is set out as a knockout format. The game also has a Casinopolis mode, which has Casino games like Roulette. There is also a chao garden, just like in the Sonic Advance games.
Sonic Pinball Party (USA) (En,Ja,Fr,De,E.desc:
本電子遊戲列表列舉了微軟Xbox360的電子遊戲。
對於中文名稱部分的說明：

列表中所有有官方中文的遊戲名字一律保持不變，絕大多數沒有官中的遊戲視情況而定：
一般來說這裡選擇的是在現有各類五花八門的譯名中接受程度最高的。
如果有同時存在民間和官方譯名的情況，那麼將使用如下格式，例如：
獵天使魔女 / 魔兵驚天錄
合金裝備崛起：復仇 / 潛龍諜影崛起：復仇
刺客信條 / 刺客教條
戰地 / 戰地風雲 等等，類似這樣。
但因為絕大多數遊戲（尤其是各種美式問答和體育遊戲）沒有官方譯名，目前還是民間譯名占大多數。以後這些中文譯名將被編輯者不定期維護更新。

Golden Sun (USA, Europe).name: 黃金太陽 失落的時代
Golden Sun (USA, Europe).original_desc: Evil is slowly covering the world. Forces of darkness are pursuing the lost art of Alchemy, and as they draw ever closer to their foul purpose, mankind hangs in the balance. You and your companions are the last hope: armed with noble weapons, magical Psynergy, and a host of elemental creatures, you must find a way to stem the evil tide.
Golden Sun (USA, Europe).desc: 邪惡正在慢慢覆蓋世界。黑暗勢力正在追尋失落的煉金術，當他們越來越接近他們的邪惡目的時，人類的命運岌岌可危。你和你的同伴是最後的希望：帶著高貴的武器、神奇的靈能和大量的元素生物，你必須找到一種方法來阻止邪惡的浪潮。

Crash Nitro Kart (USA).name: The Best
Crash Nitro Kart (USA).original_desc:
Crash Bandicoot returns to the karting scene with a host of other characters from the adventure series, and this time they have both Neo Cortex and Emperor Velo to worry about. Velo has taken the crew to a remote planet, forced to race for their lives against Neo Cortex and his many evil doers.

Choose from various game modes, from the straight into the action Arcade mode to Adventure mode, following Crash and the gang in the story to save Earth. Race against four friends in multiplayer battle modes, plus connect to the Gamecube for extra options and upload your high scores to the internet ranking system.
Crash Nitro Kart (USA).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了微軟Xbox的電子遊戲。

Urban Yeti! (USA, Europe).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Urban Yeti! (USA, Europe).original_desc: Urban Yeti is is a smooth scrolling 2 1/2-D platform adventure, and might very well be the strangest game you've ever played. You can smash your way through 4 twisting city stages, or attempt to avoid detection all together. Either way the Human AI will adapt as you progress - the more contact you have, the more aggressive they'll become. There are even some unique minigames to add to the excitement - Yeti Frisbee, managing the local "Yeti Kingdom Of Eats" restaurant, and catching poultry to offer to your prospective mate. You can even float down a lazy sewer river o' fun on a giant tube! Achieve the ultimate goal and show the world just what kind of Bigfoot you really are.
Urban Yeti! (USA, Europe).desc: Urban Yeti 是一款平滑滾動的 2 1/2-D 平台冒險遊戲，很可能是您玩過的最奇怪的遊戲。你可以一路殺出一條血路，穿過 4 個扭曲的城市關卡，或者嘗試一起躲避被發現。不管怎樣，人類人工智能都會隨著你的進步而適應——你接觸的越多，他們就會變得越有攻擊性。甚至還有一些獨特的小遊戲可以增添刺激感 - 雪人飛盤、管理當地的“雪人美食王國”餐廳，以及捕捉家禽送給你的未來伴侶。您甚至可以在巨大的管子上沿著慵懶的下水道河漂流，真是太有趣了！實現最終目標並向世界展示你到底是什麼樣的大腳怪。

Mario Kart - Super Circuit (USA).name: 马力欧系列游戏列表
Mario Kart - Super Circuit (USA).original_desc: All your favourite kart-racing characters are back and ready to kick it into high gear! 20 brand-new tracks await on Game Boy Advance, loaded with classic power-ups and primed for the type of frenzied racing that only Mario Kart: Super Circuit can deliver. It's time to burn rubber in the Grand Prix, challenge your pals, race your own ghost, clash in battle mode and feel the power in the palm of your hand!
Mario Kart - Super Circuit (USA).desc: 所有你最喜歡的卡丁車賽車角色都回來了，並準備好全力以赴！Game Boy Advance 上有 20 條全新賽道等待您的體驗，其中充滿了經典的強化道具，並為只有《馬里奧賽車：超級賽道》才能提供的瘋狂賽車類型做好了準備。是時候在大獎賽中燃燒橡膠，挑戰你的朋友，與你自己的幽靈比賽，在戰鬥模式中發生衝突，感受手掌中的力量！

Lady Sia (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).name: 希雅
Lady Sia (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).original_desc:
Lady Sia is a young female warrior princess who's attempting to save her homeland from the cruel beastmen, the T'soas. 

At the opening Sia is being thrown in prison. A veiled figure eventually helps her escape, and that's where you begin the game. Run, jump, crawl, climb, sneak and slash your way past monsters, demons, and assorted perils in order to save your empire from the evil race of the animal creatures.
Lady Sia (USA) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).desc:
西亞女士是一位年輕的女戰士公主，她試圖從殘酷的獸人提索亞人手中拯救自己的家園。

一開始，希婭就被投入監獄。一個蒙著面紗的人物最終幫助她逃脫，這就是遊戲開始的地方。奔跑、跳躍、爬行、攀爬、潛行和砍殺，穿過怪物、惡魔和各種危險，從邪惡的動物種族手中拯救你的帝國。

SpaceTwins.name: 内森·菲利安
SpaceTwins.original_desc: Join forces as the Space Twins for an action-packed adventure! With its captivating gameplay and unique mechanics, this title promises to transport players into a captivating space odyssey. Switch between two twin protagonists, each with distinct abilities, to overcome challenges and solve puzzles.
SpaceTwins.desc: 與太空雙胞胎聯手，踏上充滿動感的冒險之旅！憑藉其引人入勝的遊戲玩法和獨特的機制，這款遊戲有望將玩家帶入一場迷人的太空漫遊。在兩個具有不同能力的雙胞胎主角之間切換，以克服挑戰並解決難題。

Mega Man Battle Network (USA).name: 刺猬索尼克 (1991年游戏)
Mega Man Battle Network (USA).original_desc: In the future, a young net-battler named Lan, boots his 'personal information terminal'(PET) and prepares to hack into the network to battle net crime. Lan's PET is no ordinary network navigator. It is Mega Man.EXE, the cyber-identity, which infiltrates the crime-ridden network to battle destructive computer viruses. Defeat viruses in real time and collect Battle Chips program data, containing valuable weapons data and critical system info. Collect over 175 Battle Chips to help Netto and Mega Man.EXE restore peace and order to the network.
Mega Man Battle Network (USA).desc: 未來，一位名叫蘭的年輕網絡鬥士啟動了他的“個人信息終端”（PET），準備侵入網絡打擊網絡犯罪。Lan 的 PET 不是普通的網絡導航器。它就是 Mega Man.EXE，即網絡身份，它滲透到犯罪猖獗的網絡中，與破壞性的計算機病毒作鬥爭。實時擊敗病毒並收集戰鬥芯片程序數據，其中包含有價值的武器數據和關鍵系統信息。收集超過 175 個戰鬥籌碼來幫助 Netto 和 Mega Man.EXE 恢復網絡的和平與秩序。

Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones (USA, Au.key: Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones (USA, Australia)
Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones (USA, Au.name: 火焰之纹章系列
Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones (USA, Au.original_desc: The kingdom of Renais lies in ruins, shattered by a sudden invasion from a former ally. Guide the loyal heirs, Eirika and Ephraim, on their twin quest to rebuild Renais and discover the dark secret behind the war that has torn their homeland apart.
Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones (USA, Au.desc: 雷奈王國因前盟友的突然入侵而陷入廢墟。引導忠誠的繼承人 Eirika 和 Ephraim 踏上重建雷奈的雙重任務，並發現導致家園四分五裂的戰爭背後的黑暗秘密。

Tomato Adventure (Japan) (Translated).name: 红白机游戏列表
Tomato Adventure (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
This story takes place in a land ruled by and intended for kids: the Ketchup Kingdom. On the holiday, Tomato Day, King Abiira makes an important announcement, declaring a rebirth of the nation with the help of the six Super Kids, and unveiling an awesome machine, the Super Cara-Cooker.

Unfortunately, just after the machine is unveiled, the TV of a boy named Demiru blows out. The adventure begins when you take control of Demiru, and set out to have your TV repaired..."

Tomato Adventure is a very cute and unique RPG meant for young kids, and is currently only available in Japan. It's fairly simple compared to the more complex RPGs out there. But I still think it's very fun; it reminds me a lot of Super Mario RPG.
Tomato Adventure (Japan) (Translated).desc:
這個故事發生在一個由孩子統治並為孩子們服務的土地上：番茄醬王國。在番茄日這一節日，阿比拉國王發表了一項重要聲明，宣布國家在六個超級孩子的幫助下重生，並推出了一款令人敬畏的機器——超級卡拉炊具。

不幸的是，機器剛剛亮相，一個名叫德米魯的男孩的電視就爆炸了。當你控制德米魯並開始修理你的電視時，冒險就開始了……”

番茄大冒險是一款非常可愛且獨特的角色扮演遊戲，專為小孩子設計，目前僅在日本推出。與市面上更複雜的角色扮演遊戲相比，它相當簡單。但我還是覺得很好玩；它讓我想起了很多超級馬里奧角色扮演遊戲。

Konami Krazy Racers (USA).name: PlayStation游戏列表
Konami Krazy Racers (USA).original_desc: Konami Krazy Racers is a kart racing game with super deformed racers. It features famous Konami characters like Goemon (from Ganbare Goemon), Dracula (from Castlevania), and Vic Viper (from Gradius). There are 16 courses to race through, and you can collect coins to buy items. Gameplay is similar to that of Mario Kart.
Konami Krazy Racers (USA).desc: Konami Krazy Racers是一款擁有超級變形賽車手的卡丁車賽車遊戲。它以著名的科樂美角色為特色，如五右衛門（來自《Ganbare Goemon》）、德古拉（來自《惡魔城》）和維克·毒蛇（來自《Gradius》）。有 16 個賽道可供比賽，您可以收集金幣來購買物品。遊戲玩法與馬里奧賽車類似。

Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Tea.key: Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Team (USA, Australia)
Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Tea.original_name: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon : Red Rescue Team
Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Tea.name: 电子游戏开发商列表
Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Tea.original_desc:
Introducing the newest Pokemon, YOU!

What if you woke up one day, and you were a Pokemon? What if all of the sudden you find yourself in a NEW world, where you can speak and interact with other Pokemon? The adventure begins when you and your partner Pokemon set out on rescue missions in a world ravaged by natural disasters. But what is your true purpose and destiny in this Pokemon world? That's the real mystery....
Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Tea.desc:
介紹最新的神奇寶貝，你！

如果有一天你醒來發現自己是一隻神奇寶貝怎麼辦？如果你突然發現自己進入了一個新世界，在那裡你可以與其他神奇寶貝交談並互動怎麼辦？當你和你的伙伴口袋妖怪在遭受自然災害的世界中執行救援任務時，冒險就開始了。但你在這個神奇寶貝世界的真正目的和命運是什麼？這才是真正的奧秘......

Lilo & Stitch (USA).name: 星际宝贝
Lilo & Stitch (USA).original_desc: WARNING: Stitch is extremely dangerous. The result of an illegal genetic experiment by a mad scientist, Stitch appears to be harmless - small, furry, with six legs - but his very existence is an abomination to all that's decent in the galaxy. Last seen on the island of Hawaii in the company of a little girl named Lilo. Fugitive may be disguised as a family pet.
Lilo & Stitch (USA).desc: 警告：縫合極其危險。史迪奇是一名瘋狂科學家進行非法基因實驗的結果，它看起來是無害的——體型小，毛茸茸的，有六條腿——但他的存在本身就是對銀河系中所有正派生物的憎惡。最後一次出現是在夏威夷大島，身邊有一個名叫莉洛的小女孩。逃亡者可能偽裝成家庭寵物。

Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Revival.key: Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Revival (USA)
Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Revival.original_name: Super Street Fighter II Turbo Revival
Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Revival.name: Xbox 360游戏列表
Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Revival.original_desc: Capcom's timeless Street Fighter masterpiece conquers the Game Boy Advance system. Choose from over 16 brawlers from the Street Fighter universe and execute special moves, and super combos to wreak havoc on your opponent and become the best street fighter in the world. Lightning fast animation, unbelievable graphics and Capcom's signature gameplay make Super Street Fighter II Turbo the most respected fighting game of all time.
Super Street Fighter II Turbo - Revival.desc: Capcom 永恆的街頭霸王杰作征服了 Game Boy Advance 系統。從《街頭霸王》宇宙中超過 16 名鬥士中進行選擇，並執行特殊動作和超級連擊，對對手造成嚴重破壞，成為世界上最好的街頭霸王。快如閃電的動畫、令人難以置信的圖形和 Capcom 的標誌性遊戲玩法使 Super Street Fighter II Turbo 成為有史以來最受推崇的格鬥遊戲。

Final Fantasy VI Advance (USA).name: 最终幻想VI
Final Fantasy VI Advance (USA).original_desc:
An Ancient War Rekindled

A thousand years after the War of the Magi, the Gestahlian Empire has succeeded in reviving the lost power of magic through its clandestine Magitek research program. Now, as the Empire threatens to enslave the world with its newfound might, it is up to a band of rebels known as the Returners to find a way to strike back before the flames of war consume the world once more.
Final Fantasy VI Advance (USA).desc:
古老的戰爭重燃

賢士之戰一千年後，蓋斯塔赫利亞帝國通過其秘密的 Magitek 研究計劃成功恢復了失去的魔法力量。現在，當帝國威脅要用其新發現的力量奴役世界時，一群被稱為回歸者的叛軍必須在戰火再次吞噬世界之前找到反擊的方法。

Kingdom Hearts - Chain of Memories (USA).name: 占士·活士
Kingdom Hearts - Chain of Memories (USA).original_desc:
Adventure is in the cards!

Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories delivers an entirely new adventure and set the stage for Kingdom Hearts II. Sora, Donald, and Goofy travel through many vast and colourful worlds in search of their missing companions. Encounter over 100 of your favourite Disney and Final Fantasy friends and foes.

Collect mysterious cards that open doors to new adventures, unlock powerful abilities, and call familiar friends to your side.

Experience big, bold graphics and high-quality animation.
Kingdom Hearts - Chain of Memories (USA).desc: 本電子遊戲列表列舉了索尼PlayStation 2的電子遊戲。

Advance Wars 2 - Black Hole Rising (USA).name: Game Boy Advance游戏列表
Advance Wars 2 - Black Hole Rising (USA).original_desc: Just when you thought you'd seen the last of them, the Black Hole Army is storming back in this sequel to the award-winning Game Boy Advance strategy game. With new COs under his command, Sturm is leading a new invasion force, and it'll take advance strategy to stop him!
Advance Wars 2 - Black Hole Rising (USA).desc:
岸本齊史（岸本 斉史／きしもと まさし Kishimoto Masashi，1974年11月8日—），日本男性漫畫家。岡山縣勝田郡奈義町出身。已婚，O型血。而漫畫家岸本聖史為雙胞胎弟弟。九州產業大學藝術學部畢業。暱稱為有「キシモッさん」、「キッシー」。
代表作品《火影忍者》於1999年至2014年在《週刊少年Jump》連載，截至2019年5月，已經在46個國家/地區銷售了超過2.5億卷單行本。該系列已經被改編為三部動畫與多部電影，電子遊戲以及相關媒體。 除了《火影忍者》漫畫之外，岸本還親自指導了兩部動畫電影《火影忍者劇場版：最終章》與《火影忍者劇場版：慕留人》，並刊載了一些單篇故事。 在2019年至2020年間，在《週刊少年Jump》上連載另一部作品《SAMURAI 8 機侍 八丸傳》。
岸本從小就喜歡看漫畫，他以漫畫家鳥山明與大友克洋為目標，表現了自己想成為漫畫家的夢想。結果，岸本花了數年的時間在《週刊少年Jump》連載了自己的少年漫畫，他對此感到非常高興。
